response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds a significant value to me and I believe it would be a perfect match for your needs and aspirations. Considering its worth to both of us, I propose a transaction price of $1,300,000. This offer reflects a fair compromise between the perceived value of the product by both parties and ensures a mutually beneficial outcome. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a successful collaboration.", "product_price": 1300000}
